posts.title: Finding Joy in the Learning Curve
posts.text: Every week, something that felt impossible suddenly makes sense — and that feeling is addictive.

posts.title: The Power of Learning Together
posts.text: Learning together makes the process feel lighter, faster, and more meaningful.

posts.title: Sitting With Uncertainty
posts.text: Growth often happens in the moments we slow down, rethink, and rebuild.

posts.title: Seeing the Patterns Behind the Code
posts.text: Now I see challenges aren’t about writing more code — but recognizing patterns behind it.
